aima.core.environment.wumpusworld

Class AgentPercept

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.environment.wumpusworld.AgentPercept
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Percept

    public class AgentPercept
extends java.lang.Object
implements Percept
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 237.

    The agent has five sensors, each of which gives a single bit of information:
    • In the square containing the wumpus and in the directly (not diagonally) adjacent squares, the agent will perceive a Stench.
    • In the squares directly adjacent to a pit, the agent will perceive a Breeze.
    • In the square where the gold is, the agent will perceive a Glitter.
    • When an agent walks into a wall, it will perceive a Bump.
    • When the wumpus is killed, it emits a woeful Scream that can be perceived anywhere in the cave.
    Author:
    Federico Baron, Alessandro Daniele, Ciaran O'Reilly
